creditline: Lent by the Pavek Museum of Broadcasting, Minneapolis.  Gift of Dan Sipola
description: a: pink pith helmet with head phone attached inside; two blue tubes projecting like horns from front; round antenna at top back; b:gray, styrofoam head; c: battery pack; d: instruction sheet; e: box; f: black tube cover

title: Man-from-Mars
